channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 'I want to give millions of young people the financial foundation I never had': MrBeast buys a financial planning app for young people, but all we can ask is - why?
item.description: MrBeast acquires Step to teach financial skills to young users, expanding Beast Industries beyond media into fintech and money management.

item.title: You've only got 10 more days to get Surfshark's best plan at a discounted price with 3 extra months thrown in — here's how to claim
item.description: All of Surfshark's best features are available for less, but not for much longer

item.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 is the ultimate machine for multiplayer mayhem, and these 6 party games are truly essential
item.description: I adore my Nintendo Switch 2, and take it with me just about everywhere I go – but I always make sure to have these party games in my bag too.

item.title: I tested the Viltrox 85mm f/1.4 Pro for two months — here's why this classic portrait lens beats pricey first-party glass
item.description: Viltrox's take on the classic 85mm f/1.4 professional portrait lens is a huge success, and it's excellent value too
